body_html: Yak shaving THLongStorageView now: its use of RVO assumes that there's a copy/move constructor available on THLongStorage, but because the refcount is now std::atomic<int> there is no longer any such constructor. So I need to make THLongStorageView not be written in this pattern.
body_text: Yak shaving THLongStorageView now: its use of RVO assumes that there's a copy/move constructor available on THLongStorage, but because the refcount is now std::atomic<int> there is no longer any such constructor. So I need to make THLongStorageView not be written in this pattern.
body: Yak shaving `THLongStorageView` now: its use of RVO assumes that there's a copy/move constructor available on THLongStorage, but because the refcount is now `std::atomic<int>` there is no longer any such constructor. So I need to make `THLongStorageView` not be written in this pattern.
